#include<iostream>
#include<math.h>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;
/*inline int getn()
{
register int n=0,
    c=getchar_unlocked();
while(c < '0' || c > '9') c = getchar_unlocked();
while(c >= '0' && c <= '9')
n = (n<<3) + (n<<1) + c - '0', c = getchar_unlocked();
return n;
}*/
int main()
{
    char n[27];
    int i,k,c;
    for(i=1,k=68;i<27;i++,k++)
    {
        n[i]=k;
    }
    string s;
    cin>>s;
    for(i=0;i<s.length();i++)
    {
        c=s.at(i);
        c=c-64;
        cout<<n[c];
    }

    return 0;
}
